Description: Rim sherd of Attic black-figured pottery deep cup or skyphos with handle root; interior and top of rim glazed; exterior: black band just below rim; below, incised open lotus bud with faded added red centre with tip of possibly another lotus to its left; at right, black line around handle root.
Bibliographic references: Venit 1982 / Painted Pottery from the Greek Mainland found in Egypt, 640-450 BC (p. 362, no. B474)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0751) (Phase 1)
